objects.specification: A flat floor plane spanning the full room area with a light earthy tone surface. The floor has a smooth finish evocative of natural stone with subtle texture to provide a warm and bright prehistoric atmosphere.

A standard classroom ceiling of flush panels in a light structural finish. The panels have an even earthy color suitable for mounting lights and fixtures, blending seamlessly with the walls to maintain a bright environment.
A standard classroom wall with smooth finish painted in a light earthy tone. The surface is clean and sturdy, enclosing the space with a warm and inviting prehistoric feel.
A standard classroom wall with smooth finish painted in a light earthy tone. The surface is clean and sturdy, enclosing the space with a warm and inviting prehistoric feel.

A larger teacher desk in a darker complementary wood tone with a rectangular top and sturdy legs. The surface is smooth with subtle wood grain detail, designed to face the students and provide a focal point for instruction.

A large rectangular classroom blackboard with a matte dark green writing surface and a thin frame. It is designed for mounting on the front wall above the teacher’s desk and has a sleek, utilitarian look.
A ceiling-mounted projector with a compact white housing and front lens. It features small ventilation details and a mounting bracket aligned to project onto the blackboard.
A standard student desk with a natural wood tone rectangular top and four legs, accented with green details. It has a smooth finish and modest size, designed to seat one student facing forward.

A standard student chair with a wooden seat and backrest in natural tone, green metal frame accents, ergonomic shape, and slim legs. Designed to face forward and fit neatly with the student desk, featuring smooth edges and simple construction.

A tall rectangular bookshelf in a darker wood tone with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with books. It features clean lines and subtle grain detail on the shelves and sides, designed to stand against a wall.

A decorative dinosaur statue with realistic proportions and textured surface painted in muted natural tones. It has detailed sculpted scales and a sturdy base, intended as an educational decorative piece.

A rectangular educational poster featuring dinosaur-themed graphics and typography, encased in a thin frame. It uses vibrant colors and informative illustrations, designed to mount flat against a wall.

A round wall clock with a simple neutral-colored frame and clear hour markings. It has visible hands and numbers behind a glass face, designed for easy readability in a classroom setting.
A potted plant with lush green foliage in a simple pot. The leaves and stems are lifelike, adding natural vibrancy and a touch of greenery to the classroom corner.
A small flush-mounted ceiling light fixture with a round translucent shade for even light distribution. The design is modern and simple, intended for multiple ceiling installations.
